001package io.github.ai4ci.config;
002
003import org.immutables.value.Value;
004
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
008
009/**
010 * Configuration for running a set of experiments as a batch job. This auto
011 * detects if the job is running in the context of a SLURM multi-node batch job
012 * and if so provides a mechanism to subset the overall configuration depending
013 * on the number of SLURM nodes involved. This means that the instance of
014 * JPanSim2 running on one SLURM node does not repeat the work done by others.
015 * It also prevents SLURM nodes from overwriting each others outputs by
016 * providing node specific output directories.
017 */
018@Value.Immutable
019@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableBatchConfiguration.class)
020@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableBatchConfiguration.class)
021public interface BatchConfiguration {
022
023        /**
024         * A sensible default batch configuration used in examples and tests.
025         *
026         * <p>
027         * The default values provide a compact set of parameters used as a baseline
028         * in examples and tests. Downstream callers that rely on this simple default
029         * include example experiments.
030         *
031         * @see io.github.ai4ci.example.Experiment
032         */
033        public static ImmutableBatchConfiguration DEFAULT = ImmutableBatchConfiguration
034                        .builder().setSimulationDuration(200).setUrnBase("default")
035                        .setExporters(
036                                        Exporters.DEMOGRAPHICS, Exporters.SUMMARY,
037                                        Exporters.INFECTIVITY_PROFILE, Exporters.FINAL_STATE,
038                                        Exporters.BEHAVIOUR, Exporters.CONTACT_COUNTS
039                        ).build();
040
041        // static Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BatchConfiguration.class);
042
043        /**
044         * Gets the batch name, which is a combination of the batch number and total
045         * number of batches. This is useful for identifying the specific batch job
046         * when running multiple batches in parallel.
047         *
048         * @return The batch name in the format "batchNumber/batchTotal".
049         */
050        @JsonIgnore @Value.Derived
051        default String getBatchName() {
052                return this.getBatchNumber() + "/" + this.getBatchTotal();
053        }
054
055        /**
056         * Default value will populate from the SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID environment
057         * variable. Only set this if you know what you are doing
058         *
059         * @return The batch number, which is the index of the current job in the
060         *         SLURM array. If not running in a SLURM batch job, it defaults to
061         *         1.
062         */
063        @JsonIgnore @Value.Derived
064        default int getBatchNumber() {
065                String tmp = System.getenv("SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID"); // will be set to the
066                                                                                                                                                        // job array index
067                                                                                                                                                        // value or null.
068                if (tmp != null) return Integer.parseInt(tmp);
069                return 1;
070        }
071
072        /**
073         * Default value will populate from the SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_COUNT environment
074         * variable. Only set this if you know what you are doing
075         *
076         * @return The total number of batches, which is the total number of jobs in
077         *         the SLURM array. If not running in a SLURM batch job, it defaults
078         *         to 1.
079         */
080        @JsonIgnore @Value.Derived
081        default int getBatchTotal() {
082                String tmp = System.getenv("SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_COUNT"); // will be set to
083                                                                                                                                                                // the number of
084                                                                                                                                                                // tasks in the job
085                                                                                                                                                                // array or null.
086                if (tmp != null) return Integer.parseInt(tmp);
087                return 1;
088        }
089
090        /**
091         * Gets the list of exporters to be used in the simulation.
092         *
093         * @return An array of exporters.
094         */
095        @Value.Default
096        default Exporters[] getExporters() {
097                return new Exporters[] { Exporters.DEMOGRAPHICS, Exporters.SUMMARY,
098                                Exporters.INFECTIVITY_PROFILE, Exporters.LINELIST,
099                                Exporters.FINAL_STATE };
100        }
101
102        /**
103         * Gets the duration of the simulation.
104         *
105         * @return The simulation duration in time units.
106         */
107        int getSimulationDuration();
108
109        /**
110         * Gets the base URN for the batch configuration.
111         *
112         * @return The base URN as a string.
113         */
114        @Value.Default
115        default String getUrnBase() { return ""; }
116
117        /**
118         * Checks if the current execution is part of a SLURM batch job by looking
119         * for the presence of the SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID environment variable.
120         *
121         * @return true if the SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID environment variable is set,
122         *         indicating that the code is running as part of a SLURM batch job;
123         *         false otherwise.
124         */
125        @JsonIgnore @Value.Derived
126        default boolean isSlurmBatch() {
127                return System.getenv("SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID") != null;
128        }
129
130}
